  2. That doesn't concern me. We don't guarantee that our operations return the same results across devices. If you want to reproduce someone else's results, you should use the same configuration. It would be great if we could preserve the same sequences across GPU architectures, but not necessarily with CPU. They are devices with completely different performance characteristics, and locking ourselves to a particular PRNG implementation would be too limiting.
